lead_paragraph: DWORKIN--Phyllis F.,95, on January 28, 2016, in her home in Sarasota, FL. She is survived by her husband, Albert, 99; daughter Peggy Northrop of Barrington, RI; son Peter of San Francisco; five grandchildren, Robert, Matthew, and William Northrop and Kate and Meredith Dworkin; and two great- granddaughters. Daughter of Irving and Sophia Fieldman, Phyllis was brought up in northern New Jersey and graduated from Goucher College in 1941. After marrying Albert in 1942, and initially living in Manhattan, they settled and raised their family in Roslyn, NY. They moved in 1986 to Longboat Key, FL, where they spent many of their happiest years. She was an active volunteer in her community, including for Nassau County (New York) Legal Services and American Field Service, a member of the Temple Sinai (Roslyn) choir, and a lifelong Democrat. In lieu of flowers, preferred charities for donations in her memory are AFS-USA, Inc., Planned Parenthood, or UJA-Federation. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DWORKIN, PHYLLIS F.
